Plot: An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.
Title: The Attack
Writer: Joelle Touma, Ziad Doueiri, Yasmina Khadra (based on the novel: L'Attentat")
Actors: Ali Suliman, Reymonde Amsallem, Evgenia Dodena, Dvir Benedek
tomatoConsensus: Tense and suspenseful while remaining smart and understated, The Attack honors its complex subject with an intelligent script and captivating performances.
